Res. 278 - Global Security Priorities Resolution - NETWORK strongly supports this and other resolutions and acts which reduce the presence of nuclear weapons, globally. S 384 - Global Food Security Act - NETWORK supports this act, as long as it does not mandate further research on GMOs International Affairs account in the FY 2011 Budget - NETWORK supports the President's request for an increase in funding for support of vulnerable populations. United Nations' Arms Trade Treaty - NETWORK supports the treaty and encourages ambitious US leadership. Afghan National reconciliations talks - NETWORK supports talks between the President and the President of Afghanistan Civil Engagement and Development - NETWORK strongly supports this approach over military engagement, 48782=H.R. 4800 - Restoring Protection to Victims of Persecution Act - NETWORK supports this bill which eliminates the one-year waiting period to be granted assylum status. Pub.L 110-199 - Second Chance Act - NETWORK supports full funding in the FY 2011 budget Campaign for Youth Justice - NETWORK strongly supports legislation which will reduce the number of youth sent to adult criminal court, and remove juveniles from adult jails., 57934=HR 3012 - TRADE Act of 2009 - NETWORK strongly supports this revised approach to foreign trade, more sensitive to job and environmental issues across all parties. HR 2293/S 1644 - Amendment to the Trade Act of 1974 - NETWORK supports this effort to add a public health advisory system, 12164=HR 5504 - Improving Nutrition for America's Children Act - NETWORK supports this bill for re-authorization of the Child Nutrition Act, and encourages the authorization of $10 billion additional funding over 10 years, as requested by the President. S 3307 - Healthy, Hunger-Free Kids Act of 2010 - NETWORK supports bringing this Agriculture Committee bill to the floor of the Senate for a vote - in order that there be a bill for work by a Conference Committee. Child Nutrition Reauthorization - NETWORK met with Secretary Vilsack to encourage his work to add $10 billion over 10 years to the Child Nutrition Programs, in an attempt to stop childhood hunger by 2015. H.R. 4971 - Greening Food Deserts Act - NETWORK strongly supports federal government assistance to bring affordable and accessible fresh fruits and vegetables to all areas - particularly urban areas with high poverty rates., 1019=Lobbying Disclosure Act of 1995 (Section 5) - All Filers Are Required to Complete This Page, 15767=NETWORK opposes any multi-year cap on non-security discretionary spending. NETWORK opposes any cuts to non-security discretionary spending without significantly larger cuts from defense spending. H.RES.1492 : Providing for budget enforcement for fiscal year 2011 - NETWORK supports a budget which will move toward cutting poverty in half in ten years (by 2021)., 63087=HR 4849 - Small Business and Infrastructure Jobs Tax Act of 2010 - NETWORK strongly supported the provision for the extension of TANF emergency funds in this bill. HR 4213 - American Jobs and Closing Tax Loopholes Act of 2010 - NETWORK strongly supports this bill, 54118=National Tax Policy - NETWORK supports tax policy which supports low-income people HR 4213 - American Jobs and Closing Tax Loopholes Act of 2010 - NETWORK supports: - CTC, EITC, full income tax rate on carried interest and elimination of C-corporation loopholes - Extension of unemployment benefits, COBRA assistance, extension of TANF Emergency Fund, capitalization of NHTF ESTATE TAX - NETWORK strongly opposes any weakening of the Estate Tax by either charging a lower percentage, or raising the floor for what is taxable., 60334=HR 4851 - Continuing Extensions Act of 2010 - NETWORK strongly supports this longer extension of Unemployment Benefits and COBRA assistance, 28058=HR 4173 Restoring American Financial Stability Act of 2010 - NETWORK strongly supports the measures within this bill which - protect consumers - place controls and increase oversite on financial institutions., 40964=H.R. 5019 / H. Res.1329 - Home Star Program - NETWORK strongly supports Home Star and other programs which support environmentally sustainable construction and fitting of residences.
